definition: change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.chinese: 我再無移情別戀的負罪感。

sentences.english: And if she finds that she would like to move into love with somebody else, it is perfectly okay.
sentences.chinese: 如果她發現她要移情別戀，那也完全沒問題。

sentences.english: Mark knew that his goose was cooked when his girlfriend found him dating another girl.
sentences.chinese: 當馬克被女友發現他移情別戀時，他知道自己完了。

sentences.english: It's definitely difficult to see him move on so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 真的很難接受看見他那麼快便移情別戀。

sentences.english: After the husband leaves prison loves another, makes her to die by heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫出獄後移情別戀，令她傷心欲絕。

sentences.english: Women also practise psychiatry. It's called empathy.
sentences.chinese: 女性也在練習精神病學，這就是我們常說的移情別戀。

sentences.english: Shang Xiyao thought empathy dont love the star, a walk it.
sentences.chinese: 湯喜耀以爲星星移情別戀，一走了之。

definition: loss of love/breakup of a relationship
shady relationship/affair/adulterous relationship
better to just get the pain over with, rather than prolong the agony
pinyin: chang2 tong4 bu4 ru2 duan3 tong4

definition: traitor to one's love/heartless rat
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to go far/to escape to faraway places
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
to blame sb wrongly
original identity fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth
to lose one's cool/to get impatient/unable to remain calm
wordless and silent (idiom); without speaking/taciturn
the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to disagree/dissent
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
to carry on intimately with (idiom); ardent relationship (esp. between lovers)/billing and cooing
